channel.title: Projects on Jamie Montgomery
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jamie Montgomery

item.title: Cumulative Human Impacts
item.description: Estimating and tracking human impacts on marine ecosystems

item.title: Data-Limited Fisheries
item.description: A working group focused on developing new methods for assessing the status of data poor fish stocks globally.

item.title: Ocean Health Index
item.description: The Ocean Health Index is a framework to measure the health of the oceans. Understanding the state of our oceans is a first step towards ensuring they can continue providing humans benefits now and in the future.
